name: FireWorld Revolutions
description:
Journey to the Planet Atar IV on a quest to rescue political prisoners from the Oligarchy. This once peaceful world has been devastated by conquest and now it is up to you to seek revenge! FireWorld Revolutions features four levels of classic FPS Gameplay in an atmospheric sci-fi setting. 

Fight enemies, collect keys, discover secret areas, and unearth lore as you make your way towards your ultimate objective.
